thread.title: 7 Things to Watch for in Warren Buffett's Annual Letter
thread.title_full: 7 Things to Watch for in Warren Buffett's Annual Letter

title: 7 Things to Watch for in Warren Buffett's Annual Letter
text:
7 Things to Watch for in Warren Buffett’s Annual Letter Unilever almost certainly won't come up, but Apple and Wells Fargo might By Nicole Friedman Feb 23, 2017 12:08 pm ET 
The biggest news about this year probably won’t come up in his annual letter to shareholders, which is due out Saturday. Wall Street was caught by surprise last week when , which is partly owned by Berkshire, announced that its offer to buy PLC was rejected. The news ignited interest in Kraft Heinz’s next deal […]
